description.english: Take damage for the first time.
Get hit by drone units 500 times.
Take no damage for the first minute of a non-Hyperspace run.
Use 5 rerolls consecutively in the Support Shop.
Upgrade the Projectilizer passive to Level 5 in a run.
Pick up a Repair powerup 5 times.
Start the game for the first time.
Obtain all 5 ships from the "ORIGIN" ship pool.
Obtain a ship from the "PIONEER" ship pool.
Obtain all 5 ships from the "PIONEER" ship pool.
Destroy 10 ships with Clusterforce's Energy Cluster.
Destroy 10 ships with Arbalest in Breach Mode.
Have Pluvia tag 18 lock-ons in one attack.
Have Oracle control 3 enemy ships at the same time.
Destroy 10 ships with Monarch's Drone Assault.
Have Rave-N's 3 Diffraction Prisms fire raves at the same time.
Destroy 10 Ships with Sledgenaut's ramming attack.
Call in the Support Craft 10 times in a non-Hyperspace run.
Have 5 Afterimages active at the same time using Mirage.
Save up 50 Requisition Points in a run.
Equip 4 drone weapons in a run.
Get the player ship destroyed on a hazard area.
Destroy 10 ships with Comet's Comet Dash.
Have the Hacking Module passive activate 10 times in a run.
Gain access to Artemis Support Module in Hyperspace Mode.
Gain access to Apollo Support Module in Hyperspace Mode.
